summary: In nineteenth-century Russia, a teenage boy in search of love is drawn to two very different women.
cast: Aleksandr Palamishev|Aleksandra Zhivova|Evgeniya Kryukova|Nina Ruslanova|Sergey Garmash|Aleksandr Oleshko|Ekaterina Afrikantova|Yuliya Artemova|Ivan Dobrynin|Anastasiya Dobrynina|Mikhail Georgiu|Mikhail Lukashov|Grigoriy Malikov|Nikolay Malikov|Oleg Shcherbinin|Ilya Sherbinin
title: Moya lyubov
